Novato.Hamilton Army Airfield: Hamilton Field was a United States Air Force base (Hamilton AFB) that was inactivated in 1973, decommissioned in 1974, and put into a caretaker status with the Air Force Reserves until 1976. It was transferred to the United States Army in 1983 and redesignated an Army Airfield until its closure pursuant to BRAC action in 1988. It is located along the western shore of San Pablo Bay in the southern portion of Novato, in Marin County, California.
